Remove linebreaks between CJK characters
.
あおえ
いう
.
<p>あおえいう</p>
.

Keep linebreaks between CJK and english
.
あおえ
aoe
.
<p>あおえ
aoe</p>
.

Keep linebreaks between english and CJK
.
aoe
あおえ
.
<p>aoe
あおえ</p>
.

Emphasis tokens should be skipped
.
*あおえ*
*いう*
.
<p><em>あおえ</em><em>いう</em></p>
.

Should recognize astral characters correctly
.
foo🈀
🈀foo
.
<p>foo🈀🈀foo</p>
.
